QuestionSet.title: Diabetes Mellitus Diagnosis, Management, and Treatment
QuestionSet.description: Introductory questions on the appropriate diagnosis and management of diabetes mellitus and associated comorbidities and complications.

Question.prompt: You are performing a screening physical examination on a 47-year old man. He is generally healthy, and his review of systems is negative. His mother has type 2 diabetes, and he is overweight. Which of the following is generally accepted as the test of choice to screen for type 2 diabetes?
